project.name: systemd
project.description: The goal of Gentoo systemd project is to bring Gentoo users an opportunity to use systemd as an alternative init system and maintain documentation for that purpose.

longdescription.p: The Gentoo systemd project aims to bring Gentoo users the best experience in using systemd as an sysvinit/OpenRC alternative.
The main goals of the projects are:

ul.li: to maintain the systemd ebuilds and eclass,
to provide a documentation and support for systemd users,
and to convince Gentoo developers to install systemd units with their packages.
